article.title: Internships-Compliance Case Management
article.summary: Learn about the responsibilities of the compliance case management internships available through the Trade Agreement Compliance Program.
article.content:
Internships - Compliance Case Management

  • Collect incoming hotline complaints and consult with Compliance Staff regarding responsive actions
  • Assist with ensuring that ITA's database tracking systems are maintained and current
  • Assist with development of strategy for resolving assigned trade compliance complaints shorts of dispute settlement (make calls, attend meetings, draft papers)

Back to Internships Main
